info.title: One Stream CRUD API
info.description: API documentation for the One Stream CRUD system.

get.operationId: Handles the API request and renders the Swagger documentation view.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost:8000/api/documentation"

get.operationId: Handles requests for API documentation and returns the corresponding file content.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost:8000/api/docs"

get.operationId: Serves a specific documentation asset for the Swagger UI interface.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost:8000/api/docs/asset/{asset}"

get.operationId: Handles the OAuth2 callback and retrieves the required file for the redirect.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost:8000/api/oauth2-callback"

get.operationId: Display a listing of the resource.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost:8000/api/streams"

post.operationId: Store a newly created resource in storage.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/streams"
curl -X GET -G "http://localhost:8000/api/streams/{stream}"

put.operationId: Update the specified resource in storage.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X PUT "http://localhost:8000/api/streams/{stream}"

delete.operationId: Remove the specified resource from storage.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X DELETE "http://localhost:8000/api/streams/{stream}"

get.operationId: Display a listing of the resource.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost:8000/api/stream-types"

post.operationId: Store a newly created resource in storage.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/stream-types"

put.operationId: Update the specified resource in storage.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X PUT "http://localhost:8000/api/stream-types/{stream_type}"

delete.operationId: Remove the specified resource from storage.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X DELETE "http://localhost:8000/api/stream-types/{stream_type}"

get.operationId: Display a listing of the resource.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X GET -G "http://localhost:8000/api/users"

post.operationId: Store a newly created resource in storage.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/users"

put.operationId: Update the specified resource in storage.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X PUT "http://localhost:8000/api/users/{user}"

delete.operationId: Remove the specified resource from storage.

x-code-samples.source: curl -X DELETE "http://localhost:8000/api/users/{user}"
